text: i guess i dont really understand the HS file structure... what would the <src> be for fetching a custom module or just modules in genral

when uploading the fields.json file is it supposed to populate the fields in the design manager? I have copied it from one module to another and it said the upload was successful but no fields show in the browser editor. Do I still need to add them to the module manually? "/PricingTableWithPop.module" is the path for the module I used that returned with success. Do i need to add something to that path maybe?
